動物用藥品名稱: 禽必威雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎活毒混合疫苗(MA5+HITCHNER)
業者名稱: 先靈葆雅動物藥品股份有限公司
地址: WIM DE KORVERSTRAAT 35, 5831 AN BOXMEER, THE NETHERLAND
效能(適應症): 雞：預防新城雞瘟、傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: IB VIRUS (SEROTYPE MASSACHUSETTS, STRAIN MA5)AT LEAST 3.0LOGEID50;ND VIRUS (STRAIN HITCHNER B1) AT LEAST 6.0LOGEID50;STABILIZER PER ML (BEFORE FREEZE-DRYING):THIOUREA 9.5MG; SODIUM ASCORBATE 7.0MG; TRYPTOSE 20.0MG;SKIMMED MILK POWDER 55.0MG; GENTAMICIN SULPHATE 0.1MG.
